content: when i designed this square i was on the tail end of a dark time of my life crochet has been my go-to for the past 11 years and i barely picked up a hook for a month friends that know me often refer to me as sunshine on halloween night i decided to come out of isolation for a brief time and went live on tiktok i didn t want to be alone that night for a little while anyway one thing lead to another after encouraging words from a friend and next thing i know i came up with this design friendly reminder that kindness changes lives thank you rojo for shining me with some of your sunlight because i really needed a friend in the worst way it is the connections with other people that make life worth living always in my eyes i hope when you look at this square you see a reflection of the sun and that it makes you smile further details about the introduction to this pattern are on page 2 of the written pattern i have copy and pasted notes about the pattern itself below pattern level intermediate there s a few stitches that are not beginner level gauge since this is a square you can use any type of yarn you wish with the appropriate hook size your gauge is also different from mine so the size could vary and the gauge does not matter materials size h 5mm crochet hook 2 or 3 colors of acrylic worsted weight yarn 4 ply for the original design i used only 2 colors big twist value brand in sapphire & orange you will need approximately 60 yards of sapphire and 45 yards of orange for the 3 color design i used big twist value brand in sapphire orange & varsity gold you will need approximately 55 yards of sapphire 15 yards of orange and 35 yards of varsity gold instructions for both colorways will be included in each round you can substitute the yarn brand for anything you desire really just make sure you also use an appropriate hook size with it and remember yardage will vary needle scissors measuring tape optional compression gloves optional stitch markers optional row counter optional abbreviations mc = magic_ring chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch skip = skip space = space yo = yarn over single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet bphdc = back post half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet fpdc = front post double_crochet fptc = front post triple crochet special stitches 1 special fpdc special front post double_crochet 2 reverse special fpdc reverse special front post double_crochet 3 fpdc3tog front post double_crochet 3 together 4 fpdc cross st front post double_crochet cross stitch pattern notes please read the entire pattern before you start working this square up… it s always a good rule of thumb to prepare yourself for possible confusion before you
